caption.p: ( A) Caspase-like activity found in Sf9 cells after incubation with compounds 3b (100 µg/mL) and 3e (50 µg/mL), or the reference insecticide chlorpyrifos (CHPY, 100 µg/mL), for 24 h. ( B) Viability of human keratinocytes exposed to compounds 3b and 3e (100 µg/mL), medium (control), or the reference insecticide chlorpyrifos (CHPY, 100 µg/mL). Cells were incubated for 24 h, after which viability was evaluated. * p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001.
